title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description: IBM - FoodTrust Blockchain Team, Littleton, MA
details: Wrote a Python script to convert codebase, 7,553 lines added and 2,477 removed, from Angular's i18n to ngx-translate using advanced Regex, NLP, and locality analysis
Fixed 2 existing issues regarding resizing FoodTrust's UI charts
Developed a highly customizable report generator web app for managing multiple Github repositories
Created an Angular end-to-end testing framework

title: Deep Learning Software Developer, CCIT (Clemson Computing & Information Technology)
details: Use Tensorflow to generate 3D images from 2D images

title: Open EdX online learning website Developer, CCIT
description: Cicisecure project, A collaboration online course platform of 5 universities funded by NSF
details: Collaborate with 2 graduate students to build the infrastructure and deploy it
Developed a docker software to portably make incremental pull backups from cloud instances or local instances
Created an easy-to-use Python wrapper for MongoDB query

title: Network Traffic Simulator Developer, CCIT
description: A simulator that is based on "Towards Effective Virtualization of Intrusion Detection Systems" by Nuyun Zhang et al
details: Collaborated with 2 other undergraduate students to design the program and write a research paper of our findings
Created a linux command line interface for running the simulator
